entry.title: Broken Threading
entry.summary: The context provided is regarding an issue of broken threading due to auto forwarding between mail providers. The person who wrote this message apologizes for the inconvenience caused and has created a new dedicated outlook account (thyshizzle at outlook.com) to fix the issue. The person assures that they will use this new account for all their subscriptions and will unsubscribe the yahoo address. This step should solve the threading issue going forward.
